body:
I just noticed today that a new transaction I created took 10 minutes before it was requested by the connected nodes. Any ideas why?

extract from debug.log:-

2014-02-28 20:57:10 AddToWallet 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539  new
2014-02-28 20:57:10 AddToWallet 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539  
2014-02-28 20:57:10 Relaying wtx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539
2014-02-28 21:07:09 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:8
2014-02-28 21:07:12 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:4
2014-02-28 21:07:12 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:2
2014-02-28 21:07:14 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:6
2014-02-28 21:07:17 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:3
2014-02-28 21:07:22 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:1
2014-02-28 21:07:23 received getdata for: tx 18e28621e3230b3cc89d8d30ec6a76227a9084ed2ec0352b48a9315c6ee03539 from node:7

As a side note, why is AddToWallet being run twice?
title: Transaction took 10 minutes to be relayed
